page.title: 10TYPICAL DAY:WORKING MOTHER
page.content: My mum has 4 children 3 at school and 1 at work.She gets up at 7.30 a.m. and gets breakfast for my small brother and sister aged 6 and 4.She then dresses them for school.My dad takes them to West Drayton Primary School at about 8.40 a.m.My mum clearrs up the breakfast things and then gets ready for work at 9.00 a.m.She works at Drinkwater Sabeys on the V.D.U. for the accounts.At 12.00 p.m. she has an hour's lunch break and then goes back to work until 3.00 p.m. at which time she goes to pick my brother and sister up from school.When she gets home abbout 4.00 p.m. she gets the tea ready for about 5.00 p.m.unless my dad is late home from work in which case we go out.My mum usually spends aout Â£50 a week on food.She puts my brother and sister to bed at 7 and goes herself betwwen 11 and 12.
